item.title: 郭文贵2020年11月14日连线香草山
item.description: 内容梗概: 韩梅梅女士：郭先生您好！我们现在演播室我的这个co-host，他是非常非常激动，因为他是第一次见到您，他想马上的跟您打一声招呼，David。 文贵先生：Hi Sir David，梅梅好。How are you？ 韩梅梅女士：David， go ahead。 David：Mr Guo, it is absolutely honored to meet you, thank you so much for everything you done, for the Chinese people, and to wake Americans up, to what’s really going on here. My wife is Chinese, that’s how I got involved with this cause. And I am absolutely 100% honor to be your presence today. I’m willing to do whatever takes to spread the world about the New Federal State of China, which will happen, and we will over-take the CCP, and China will be free again.
